channel.title: Metal Gear fan remake gets Konami's blessing
channel.description:
![](upload://9rGEv4sDBPeQHCDCJVLxknM9YqJ.png) [url='https://www.gamespot.com/articles/konami-gives-green-light-to-first-metal-gear-fan-remake/1100-6420017/']https://www.gamespot.com/articles/konami-gives-green-light-to-first-metal-gear-fan-remake/1100-6420017/[/url] [quote] A group of amateur developers going by the name Outer Heaven is currently working on a remake of the original Metal Gear from 1988, and it recently received Konami’s blessing.
A lot of the time publishers who own the rights to old games send cease-and-desist letters when they hear about something like this (Square Enix shutting down the Chrono Trigger remake Chrono Resurrection comes to mind), but Outer Heaven recently announced it got word from Konami that it’s free to continue its work under one condition: Outer Heaven can’t make a profit or accept donations for the project. [/quote] [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/metal-gear-remake']ModDB page,[/url] they're using the Alien Swarm engine
What's your thought's on this?

item.title: Metal Gear fan remake gets Konami's blessing
item.dc:creator: Diabolical
item.description:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/konami-gives-green-light-to-first-metal-gear-fan-remake/1100-6420017/

A group of amateur developers going by the name Outer Heaven is currently working on a remake of the original Metal Gear from 1988, and it recently received Konami’s blessing.

A lot of the time publishers who own the rights to old games send cease-and-desist letters when they hear about something like this (Square Enix shutting down the Chrono Trigger remake Chrono Resurrection comes to mind), but Outer Heaven recently announced it got word from Konami that it’s free to continue its work under one condition: Outer Heaven can’t make a profit or accept donations for the project.

ModDB page, they’re using the Alien Swarm engine

What’s your thought’s on this?
